body_html:
[UPDATE]

Ok I did

$ sudo pip install matplotlib --upgrade

now I get

$ python -c "import matplotlib; import numpy as np; print matplotlib.__version__; print np.__version__"
1.5.3
1.11.2

I will try again then.

body:
**[UPDATE]**

Ok I did

```
$ sudo pip install matplotlib --upgrade
```

now I get

```
$ python -c "import matplotlib; import numpy as np; print matplotlib.__version__; print np.__version__"
1.5.3
1.11.2
```

I will try again then.
